divs: Sighting DetailsSitting on deck ALONE THIS TImE, AROUND 8 EASTERN TImE, taped an odd dark boomerang cloud at the corner of my roof whooting a grey beam across the sky..it went behind my house then sudenly 3 or 4 black crafts appeared flying together I video taped them straight to this v shaped thing in the sky.. I kept taping and more were entering and leaving... incredible.. Can someone tell me wtf is happening to me... I posted the ufo over ALTOONA THE OTHER DAY ON HERE..WITH THE VORTEX AND SPARKLES. EmAIL IF YOU HAVE ANY CLUE. THIS THING THEY WERE FLYING IN AND OUT OF WAS THE SAmE COLOR OF mY OTHER VIDEO AND WAS UP THERE FOREVER, NOT mOVING.
